LinkedInTips.Name: Setup Job Alerts
LinkedInTips.Explanation: Job alerts are used to notify you about new job openings.

LinkedInTips.Name: Set Viewing Options
LinkedInTips.Explanation: This will determine what people see when you view their profile. I'd recommend private mode.
Instructions: Tap the "Home" icon at the bottom of the screen
In the top left corner click on your profile picture and a sidebar should open.
At the bottom of the sidebar click "Settings".
In the menu click "Visbility" which should go to a new screen.
Click "Profile viewing options" in the menu
Select "Private mode" (or whatever mode you want people to see when you view their profile).
